A4.text: The Browns have only posted four winning seasons (2002, 2007, 2020, and 2023)

A5.text: In 2020, the Browns secured their first playoff berth since 2002 by defeating the Pittsburgh Steelers in week 17 and finishing the season 11–5

A6.text: This would be Cleveland's last winning season until 2020

A7.text: In Week 6 of the 2014 season, the Browns defeated the Steelers 31–10
